SNSM'17 is part of the 3rd World Congress on Electrical Engineering and Computer Systems and Science (EECSS'17). For more information about the congress, please visit the website here: www.2017.eecss.org.

International Conference on Social
Networks and Social Media (SNSM'17)

June 4 - 6, 2017 | Rome, Italy

Paper Submission

·

Important Dates

·

Registration

Search:


SNSM'17 is part of the 3rd World Congress on Electrical Engineering and Computer Systems and Science (EECSS'17).
For more information about the congress, please visit the website here: www.2017.eecss.org.

Announcements

1

SNSM 2017:

SNSM 2017 will be held in Rome, Italy on June 4 - 6, 2017.

EECSS'17 Workshop

As per popular request, the organizing committee has decided to extend the EECSS'17 congress to three days (now June 4 - 6, 2017). The new high-level schedule is as follows:

  • Day 1: Workshop(s) and Registration
  • Day 2: Main Track Conference Sessions
  • Day 2: Main Track Conference Sessions and Gala dinner or Cruise tour

Registration for the workshop will be 122 EURs (VAT included) and separate from the main conferences. Workshop attendees will receive a certificate of participation. For registration, please visit: here.

More information to follow; we greatly appreciate your patience!

2

Best Paper Award:

Two best paper awards will be conferred to author(s) of the papers that receive the highest rank during the peer-review and by the respected session chairs. Please visit Paper Submission for more information.

3

Propose Exhibits, Workshops & More

SNSM attracts a wide range of researchers in the field of social networks and social media. As a prominent company in the field of social networks and social media, we would like to offer you an exhibit at SNSM. Please visit Events for more information.

Your payment has been successful!

We thank you very much for registering for SNSM'17. An email has been sent to you confirming your payment to SNSM'17. Please keep this email for your reference.

Please make sure you fill out and submit the registration form. Failing to fill out this form will result in the elimination of your registration.

You may find the registration form by following the link below:

www.snsmconference.com/registration

Should you have any concerns, questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us at:

registration@snsmconference.com

We are looking forward to seeing you at SNSM'17!
